text: Young Dracula is a British children's fantasy television series. It is shown on CBBC. The series is based on Young Dracula AND Young Monsters, a children's book by Michael Lawrence. The series is directed by Joss Agnew. It was first broadcast in 2006. Young Dracula was nominated for Best Children's Drama in the 2008 BAFTA Awards. A fourth series is now being filmed. == References == Category:Children's television series Category:BBC Television programmes Category:English-language television programs
title: Young Dracula
